clap.modules.template.log¶
clap.modules.template.list_templates() → Dict[str, Any]¶

Get the instance templates defined in the instance configuration files.

Returns

Dictionary with instance templates. The keys are the instance name and the value are the values for the instance. The dictionary have the same values for the instance configuration files

Return type

Dict[str, Any]

clap.modules.template.list_templates() → Dict[str, Any]¶

Get the instance templates defined in the instance configuration files.

Returns

Dictionary with instance templates. The keys are the instance name and the value are the values for the instance. The dictionary have the same values for the instance configuration files

Return type

Dict[str, Any]

clap.modules.template.list_instance_types() → List[str]¶

Get the instance templates defined in the instance configuration files (only instance names)

Returns

List with instance template names, from the instance configuration files.

Return type

List[str]
